full_text: From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) To: Lee Plourde (b)(6) @bop.gov> @thedailybeast.com> Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein Sent: Sat, 10 Aug 2019 19:17:52 +0000 Thanks, Lee. 1. When was Epstein taken off suicide watch? 2. How long was he on suicide watch? 3. What unit in the jail was he housed? 4. Was he by himself? 5. What's (b)(6) protocol for watching him at 6:30 in the morning? And in general during a 24 hour period? 6. Is there an internal investigation? Are the guard(s) and/or supervisors placed on modified duty/or some sort of restricted duty while there is an ongoing investigation? 7. Are there surveillance cameras? If so what do they show? 8. What did he use to hang himself? (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Senior Editor, writer The Daily Beast M: 267-257 (b)(6) Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: @ (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) From: Lee Plourde (b)(6) @bop.gov> Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 3:10:00 PM To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @thedailybeast.com> Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein Good afternoon, I you may understand with the ongoing events please understand that time is very limited. Please submit any questions you may have and I will respond as best and as soon as I am able to. Thank you >> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @thedailybeast.com> 8/10/2019 2:30 PM >>> Hi Lee: Can you give me a call when you have a moment. Thanks. 267-257 (b)(6) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Senior Editor, writer The Daily Beast M: 267-257 (b)(6) Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: @ (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) From: BOP-IPP/Public Affairs <BOP-IPP/PublicAffairs@bop.gov> Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 10:59:39 AM To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @thedailybeast.com> Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein (b)(6) DOJ-OGR-00023527

text_blocks.content: From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) To: Lee Plourde (b)(6) @bop.gov> @thedailybeast.com> Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein Sent: Sat, 10 Aug 2019 19:17:52 +0000 Thanks, Lee. 1. When was Epstein taken off suicide watch? 2. How long was he on suicide watch? 3. What unit in the jail was he housed? 4. Was he by himself? 5. What's (b)(6) protocol for watching him at 6:30 in the morning? And in general during a 24 hour period? 6. Is there an internal investigation? Are the guard(s) and/or supervisors placed on modified duty/or some sort of restricted duty while there is an ongoing investigation? 7. Are there surveillance cameras? If so what do they show? 8. What did he use to hang himself?
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Senior Editor, writer The Daily Beast M: 267-257 (b)(6) Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: @ (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)

From: Lee Plourde (b)(6) @bop.gov> Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 3:10:00 PM To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @thedailybeast.com> Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein Good afternoon, I you may understand with the ongoing events please understand that time is very limited. Please submit any questions you may have and I will respond as best and as soon as I am able to. Thank you >> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @thedailybeast.com> 8/10/2019 2:30 PM >>> Hi Lee: Can you give me a call when you have a moment. Thanks. 267-257 (b)(6)
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Senior Editor, writer The Daily Beast M: 267-257 (b)(6) Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: @ (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
From: BOP-IPP/Public Affairs <BOP-IPP/PublicAffairs@bop.gov> Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 10:59:39 AM To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @thedailybeast.com> Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein (b)(6)

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The content appears to be related to an investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death while in custody.
